mapper.insert: insert into product_table (category_num, prod_title, prod_price, prod_inventory, prod_img_name, prod_description_name) values(#{category_num}, #{prod_title}, #{prod_price}, #{prod_inventory}, #{prod_img_name}, #{prod_description_name})
mapper.update: update product_table set category_num = #{category_num}, prod_title = #{prod_title}, prod_price=#{prod_price}, prod_inventory=#{prod_inventory}, prod_img_name=#{prod_img_name}, prod_description_name=#{prod_description_name} where prod_num=#{prod_num}
mapper.select: select * from product_table order by category_num limit #{pagenum}, #{contentnum}
select * from product_table where category_num=#{categorynum} order by prod_num limit #{pagenum}, #{contentnum}
select count(*) from product_table where category_num = #{categorynum}
